title: 'Starfleet Academy' isn't the first time that 'Star Trek' tried to go back to school
description: The new teen-led Paramount+ TV show isn't Trek's first attempt to study at the Academy.
content: The new teen-led Paramount+ TV show isn't Trek's first attempt to study at the Academy.
